alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 9:57PM CDT until March 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, with a light glaze of ice possible due to mixed precipitation. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena
